description: A political arena where the foods themselves discuss the broken food system, through the use of artificial intelligence. Join the discussion on what actions need to be taken to form a locally and globally sustainable food system!

aboutText.about:
What would a biologically grown potato think about pesticides? How would a mass-produced banana respond? And what would you add to the discussion? Can AI identify as a rare mushroom? Could it help give a voice to the "voiceless" in decision-making?

Welcome to the Council of Foods! A political arena where the foods themselves discuss the broken food system - through artificial intelligence.

In the Council of Foods, AI language models are prompted to speak as a diversity of foods, embodying distinct values and ethical positions shaped in collaboration with food system experts. Each discussion is unique and not limited to the food system alone—broader societal issues emerge through the voices of industrially farmed, genetically modified, and wild-foraged foods. You, dear human, are invited to engage, challenge assumptions, and influence the conversation, which culminates in a policy recommendation document.

reset.lang:
It is not possible to change language in the middle of an ongoing meeting.
Do you want to start over from the beginning?

name.title: SAY SOMETHING
name.1: Do you want to adress the Council of Foods?
name.2: Please enter your name to raise a request to speak,
name.21: and then wait until you are given the floor by Water, the moderator.
name.unique: name must be unique in the council

controls.wait: wait for your turn to speak

human.1: Type your question or start recording...
human.panelist: What does {{name}} have to say about this?

completed.title: Is that it?
completed.1: This meeting is starting to get long-winded,
completed.2: is it time to come to a conclusion?

disclaimer.1: This document was created by the Council of Foods, a political arena where the foods themselves discuss the broken food system, through the use of artificial intelligence. While every effort has been made to generate meaningful content, please note the following:
disclaimer.2: This document may contain misinformation, outdated details, propaganda, or bad ideas.
disclaimer.3: The discussions may provide useful insights and reflect diverse ethical positions but should not replace evidence-based research or deep contemplation.
disclaimer.4: Don't just chat about it—get up and take action!
disclaimer.5: Council of Foods is an initiative by art & design collective
